Peace Anyiam-Osigwe (1969-2023), onye bụbu Peace Anyiam-Fiberesima MFR amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Maachi bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri na Onye isi ntụrụndụ nke akpọrọ "eze nwanyị nke ihe nkiri Nollywood"
O bu onye hiwere emume ihe nkiri n’uwa niile bụ, Africa Movie Academy Awards
Akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian dere na ọ bụ ọsụ ụzọ na-egosi ihe nkiri Nollywood na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa
Ọ duziri vidiyo egwu mbụ nke mmetụtara hip-hop bụ, P-Square
N’afọ 2012, gọọmentị Naịjirịa mere ya onye otu ‘Federal Republic ’ maka mgbalị ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri/ntụrụndụ
Ọ bụ onye otu TED
Anyiam-Osigwe amụrụ na abalị iri-ato nke onwa Maachi  O sitere na ezi ama ama bụ ezi Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe dị na Nkwerre, Imo Steeti
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụaka asatọ
O nwere asambodo Iwu na politikal sayensị na Mahadum Oxford Brookes
Anyiam-Osigwe guzobere Africa Film Academy, otu na-achịkwa emume ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2005
Emere nturu ugo a ka ọ bụrụ otu n’ime onyinye kacha nwee ùgwù nye ndị Afrika nọ n’ememe ihe nkiri
Na mbipụta nke iri, ọ rịturu dị ka onye isi nke AMAAs
Na 2015, ọ malitere atumatu AfricaOne iji cheta ndị Afrika ngalaba ọrụ ntụrụndụ
Anyiam-Osigwe bụ odee nke abụ ederede
O nwere akwụkwọ ato nyere ya nkwalite
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Alana Herro, ọ kọwara uri dịka otu n'ime ụzọ iji gosipụta nghọta ya na nghọta nke ihe gbara ya gburugburu
Tupu ọ banye mahadum, o bipụtara otu magazin akpọrọ, Clicks, nke edepụtara iji kwado ndị ojii na England
Ọrụ ya gbadoro ụkwụ na nkwado/nkwuchitere ọnụ
Ọrụ Anyiam-Osigwe na telivishọn malitere site na  ihe omume mkparịta ụka bụ, Piece off my mind, nke na-elekwasị anya na mmeghachi omume ndị mmadụ na nsogbu obodo nke anaghị ahụkarị na mgbasa ozi
Okwu ngosi ya gbadoro ụkwụ n'okwu gbasara ịkwuchitere ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ndị bụ ndị obodo anaghị elebakarị anya
O rụrụ aka n'usoro ihe nkiri Afrika, ịzụ ụmụaka na ịha nhatanha ụmụ nwanyị dịka mpaghara na-amasị ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Na mbido egwu abụọ, ọrụ P-Square, Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye lekọtara ha
Na 2016, o kwuru na ya na-anọchite Somkele Inyamah
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ, Michael, onye e gburu na 2014 bụ onye nhazi nchịkọta nke Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe Foundation, otu na-anaghị achọ uru na-enyeghachi ndị Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi, "Afrika Institute for Leadership Research and Development” na kansul jeneral nke Malawi na Naịjirịa
Nne ya, Dorothy Chinyere Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye nnata nke  Office of the Order of the Niger site n’aka onye isi ala n’oge ahụ bụ, Olusegun Obasanjo maka ọrụ ebere ya na Naịjirịa
Ya na di ya kewapụrụ
